archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Data Security
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Manage data security process provides capabilities to manage the data compliance, manage data security, perform data security and manage the security audit reporting.

properties.value: Manage data security process ensures that the data maintained within the enterprise meets the security requirements. Additionally it provides capabilities to perform the data security audit on periodic basis and manage the audit reports. The level of data security requirements might differ based on various factors like location (Country), Enterprise strategy etc. process within â€œManage Data Securityâ€� should ensure that requirements from various perspective are met and fulfilled.
